pokemon.name: victini
pokemon.dex: It creates an unlimited supply of energy inside its body, which it shares with those who touch it.

pokemon.name: snivy
pokemon.dex: It is very intelligent and calm. Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes its movements swifter.

pokemon.name: servine
pokemon.dex: When it gets dirty, its leaves can't be used in photosynthesis, so it always keeps itself clean.

pokemon.name: serperior
pokemon.dex: It can stop its opponents' movements with just a glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts it internally.

pokemon.name: tepig
pokemon.dex: It blows fire through its nose. When it catches a cold, the fire becomes pitch-black smoke instead.

pokemon.name: pignite
pokemon.dex: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.

pokemon.name: emboar
pokemon.dex: A flaring beard of fire is proof that it is fired up. It is adept at using many different moves.

pokemon.name: oshawott
pokemon.dex: It fights using the scalchop on its stomach. In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately by slashing.

pokemon.name: dewott
pokemon.dex: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique.

pokemon.name: samurott
pokemon.dex: In the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.

pokemon.name: patrat
pokemon.dex: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won't notice a foe coming from behind.

pokemon.name: watchog
pokemon.dex: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents.

pokemon.name: lillipup
pokemon.dex: Though it is a very brave Pokémon, it's also smart enough to check its foe's strength and avoid battle.

pokemon.name: herdier
pokemon.dex: It loyally follows its Trainer's orders. For ages, they have helped Trainers raise Pokémon.

pokemon.name: stoutland
pokemon.dex: This extremely wise Pokémon excels at rescuing people stranded at sea or in the mountains.

pokemon.name: purrloin
pokemon.dex: Their cute act is a ruse. They trick people and steal their valuables just to see the looks on their faces.

pokemon.name: liepard
pokemon.dex: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.

pokemon.name: pansage
pokemon.dex: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.

pokemon.name: simisage
pokemon.dex: It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered tail. This Pokémon is wild tempered.

pokemon.name: pansear
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600° F.

pokemon.name: simisear
pokemon.dex: It loves sweets because they become energy for the fire burning inside its body.

pokemon.name: panpour
pokemon.dex: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.

pokemon.name: simipour
pokemon.dex: The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.

pokemon.name: munna
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon appears before people and Pokémon who are having nightmares and eats those dreams.

pokemon.name: musharna
pokemon.dex: With the mist from its forehead, it can create shapes of things from dreams it has eaten.

pokemon.name: pidove
pokemon.dex: Each follows its Trainer's orders as best it can, but they sometimes fail to understand complicated commands.

pokemon.name: tranquill
pokemon.dex: It can return to its Trainer's location regardless of the distance separating them.

pokemon.name: unfezant
pokemon.dex: Males swing the plumage on their heads to threaten others, but females are better at flying.

pokemon.name: blitzle
pokemon.dex: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.

pokemon.name: zebstrika
pokemon.dex: When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.

pokemon.name: roggenrola
pokemon.dex: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.

pokemon.name: boldore
pokemon.dex: Because its energy was too great to be contained, the energy leaked and formed orange crystals.

pokemon.name: gigalith
pokemon.dex: The solar rays it absorbs are processed in its energy core and fired as a ball of light.

pokemon.name: woobat
pokemon.dex: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about its surroundings.

pokemon.name: swoobat
pokemon.dex: It emits sound waves of various frequencies from its nose, including some powerful enough to destroy rocks.

pokemon.name: drilbur
pokemon.dex: By spinning its body, it can dig straight through the ground at a speed of 30 mph.

pokemon.name: excadrill
pokemon.dex: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.

pokemon.name: audino
pokemon.dex: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.

pokemon.name: timburr
pokemon.dex: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.

pokemon.name: gurdurr
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.

pokemon.name: conkeldurr
pokemon.dex: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.

pokemon.name: tympole
pokemon.dex: They warn others of danger by vibrating their cheeks to create a high-pitched sound.

pokemon.name: palpitoad
pokemon.dex: It lives in the water and on land. It uses its long, sticky tongue to capture prey.

pokemon.name: seismitoad
pokemon.dex: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.

pokemon.name: throh
pokemon.dex: When they encounter foes bigger than themselves, they try to throw them. They always travel in packs of five.

pokemon.name: sawk
pokemon.dex: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.

pokemon.name: sewaddle
pokemon.dex: Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.

pokemon.name: swadloon
pokemon.dex: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.

pokemon.name: leavanny
pokemon.dex: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.

pokemon.name: venipede
pokemon.dex: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.

pokemon.name: whirlipede
pokemon.dex: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.

pokemon.name: scolipede
pokemon.dex: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.

pokemon.name: cottonee
pokemon.dex: They go wherever the wind takes them. On rainy days, their bodies are heavier, so they take shelter beneath big trees.

pokemon.name: whimsicott
pokemon.dex: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.

pokemon.name: petilil
pokemon.dex: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.

pokemon.name: lilligant
pokemon.dex: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect, but taking care of it is very difficult.

pokemon.name: basculin
pokemon.dex: Red and blue ________ get along so poorly, they'll start fighting instantly. These Pokémon are very hostile.
